Class HighStakesVariant

java.lang.Object
variant.HighStakesVariant
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariant
public class HighStakesVariant extends Object implements GameVariant
Represents the High Stakes variant of the Jest card game. This variant amplifies scoring with doubled base points and tripled trophy values, creating a high-risk, high-reward gameplay experience.

Key features:

  • All base points are multiplied by 2x
  • Trophy cards are worth 3x their normal value
  • Standard 2 cards per player each round
See Also:
  • GameVariant
  • ClassicVariant
  • SpeedVariant

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(Player player)
      Calculates the points for a player with the High Stakes multiplier applied. The base Jest points are multiplied by 2.
      Specified by:
      calculatePoints in interface GameVariant
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getCardsPerPlayer

      public int getCardsPerPlayer(int roundNumber)
      Determines the number of cards each player receives per round. In High Stakes mode, players always receive 2 cards per round.
      Specified by:
      getCardsPerPlayer in interface GameVariant
      Parameters:
      roundNumber - the current round number (not used in this variant)
      Returns:
      always returns 2

    • applyRoundStartRules

      public void applyRoundStartRules(Game game)
      Applies special rules at the start of each round. On the first round, displays prominent messages announcing High Stakes mode with doubled points and tripled trophy values.
      Specified by:
      applyRoundStartRules in interface GameVariant
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance

    • applyRoundEndRules

      public void applyRoundEndRules(Game game)

      Specified by:
      applyRoundEndRules in interface GameVariant

      hasTrophyModification in interface GameVariant
